extensionPageActionDefaultTitle.description: Default title of the extension's page action.

extensionPageActionEnterVRTitle.description: Title of the extension's page action for a user to enter a scene on a WebVR page.

extensionPageActionExitVRTitle.description: Title of the extension's page action for a user to exit a scene on a WebVR page.

notificationHeadsetConnectedTitle.description: Title of the notification for when a headset is connected.

notificationHeadsetDisconnectedTitle.description: Title of the notification for when a headset is disconnected.
